revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #14 Pinia (Pinap) |image = [[File:Pinap.png]] |caption = Tiene una piel ácida y dicen que, si se pela, se puede reducir a polvo para elaborar una medicina. |growtime = 4m 0s |harvest = 13 bayas |replant = 40% |mutation = 1.5% |points = 35 |flavor =
*10 picante *0 seco *0 dulce *0 amargo *10 ácido }} '''Pinia (Pinap)''' es un tipo de [[Berries|baya]] que puede ser plantada en la [[Farm|granja]]. Se puede obtener rodeando una parcela vacía con al menos 1 baya [[Sitrus|Zidra (Sitrus)]] y al menos 1 baya [[Aspear|Perasi (Aspear)]]. == Tablas de Crecimiento == === Estados de Crecimiento === {| class="wikitable" | style = "image-rendering: pixelated" !!! Brote !! Crecimiento !! Floración !! Madurez |- ! Tiempo pasado desde que se planta | 30 seg || 1 min || 3 mins || 4 mins - 8 mins |- ! Animación |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:PinapTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} === Tiempos de Maduración con modificadores === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modificador !! Tiempo hasta la madurez-marchitado |- ! Ninguno | 4 min -
8 min |- ! Psydugadera | 2 min 40 seg -
5 min 20 seg |} == Diagrama de Flujo == [[File:Pinap_Flow_Chart.png|200px]]
'''Leyenda:'''
· Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta == Estrategia de mutación == === Posibles formaciones === Puedes llenar tu granja del siguiente modo para obtener bayas Pinia (Pinap). Los cuadrados morados indican dónde pueden ocurrir las mutaciones.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Sitrus]] || - || - || - |- | [[Aspear]] || 2 mins until ripe || 1 min 20 secs || Not Practical |- |}
==Uses== ===Mutations===
Pinap berries can be used to mutate the following berries.
{| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |- ! Used In !! With |- | [[File:Qualot.png|20px]] [[Qualot]] || [[File:Mago.png|20px]] [[Mago]] |- | [[File:Nomel.png|20px]] [[Nomel]] || - |- | [[File:Wacan.png|20px]] [[Wacan]] || [[File:Iapapa.png|20px]] [[Iapapa]]
[[File:Qualot.png|20px]] [[Qualot]]
[[File:Grepa.png|20px]] [[Grepa]] |- |}
==Acquisition== ===Dungeons=== {{Loot/head‎|Berries}} {{LootItem|Radio Tower|Epic}} {{LootItem|Magma Hideout|Common}} {{LootItem|Dragonspiral Tower|Common}} |} |}

{{Berries}}

'''Leyenda:'''
· Random Drop: Obtenido aleatoriamente en ruta == Estrategia de mutación == === Posibles formaciones ===
You can fill your farm in the following way to obtain Pinap berries. Purple squares indicate where mutations can occur.
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Base Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |}
{| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Optimized Planting Formation |- style="height: 50px;" | style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="width: 40px; background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |- style="height: 50px;" | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Sitrus.png|30px]] [[Sitrus]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | |- | style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || style="background-color:#9C7D98;" | || [[File:Aspear.png|30px]] [[Aspear]] |}
=== Timing Table === {| class="wikitable" | style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch or Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch & Sprayduck |- | [[Sitrus]] || - || - || - |- | [[Aspear]] || 2 mins until ripe || 1 min 20 secs || Not Practical |- |}

Pinap berries can be used to mutate the following berries.

[[File:Qualot.png|20px]] [[Qualot]]
[[File:Grepa.png|20px]] [[Grepa]] |- |}
